nextSection.title: Experience & Focus
paragraphs: Senior Product / Tech focused professional with experience in building scalable platforms, international products, and AI-driven workflows.
Strong background in startups, operations, product strategy, and engineering collaboration.

items.title: SEO & Content Freelancer
items.description: Small freelance projects: writing and optimizing texts for SEO. First hands-on experience with digital platforms like Upwork.

items.title: Technical SEO & Analytics Specialist
items.description: First long-term role. Worked with WordPress, Google Analytics, GTM, Search Console, and technical SEO implementation.

items.title: Growth & Performance Marketing Manager
items.description: Growth in performance marketing and tracking. Worked with Shopify, custom templates, Meta & Google measurement, media partners.

items.title: Executive Lead — Growth, Ops & Performance
items.description: Promoted to executive role at ChipChip. KPI ownership, team management, and financial and performance analysis.

career.title: Background

experiences.intro: Led performance marketing across Meta (Facebook & Instagram), Google Ads, and Telegram with geo-focused targeting on Addis Ababa.
highlights: Managed €73,000+ in Meta ad spend and drove 89,000+ attributed app registrations (~€0.82 per registered user).
Generated 67,000+ first-time attributed customers via paid acquisition (~€1.08 per first-time customer).
Helped seed the initial user base that accelerated organic growth to 130,000+ total users.
Improved retention through funnel, offer, and creative iteration: 30-day second-purchase rate peaked at 82%, averaging ~70% over the year.
Ran continuous A/B tests on creatives, audiences, and landing flows to scale efficiently and hit KPI targets.
Built automated performance reporting and analytics (Python scripts + dashboards) for marketing, sales, and finance workflows.
Owned the company website end to end (development and maintenance) using React and Node.js.

experiences.intro: Managed multi-channel paid acquisition across Meta, Google Ads, Bing, and Twitter with full-funnel tracking, ROI analysis, and budget ownership.
highlights: Planned and executed Black Friday Meta Ads campaigns (US, B2C e-commerce) with budgets up to €5.9K, generating €16.4K in direct revenue (ROAS 3.44), later scaling to €20.4K direct plus €21.5K attributed offline sales with total account ROAS 9.27.
Built advanced audience structures including LTV-based lookalikes, 11 custom audiences, multi-audience testing frameworks, and KPI dashboards for real-time performance monitoring.
Implemented offline conversion tracking using Facebook Graph API and Zapier to connect CRM and in-store sales with advertising platforms.
Led SEO growth from ~100–200 monthly users to 3,000–4,000 targeted organic users per month within 6 months, reaching 10,000+ monthly Google users by 2020.
Achieved consistent top-5 Google rankings in the US and Canada for high-intent keywords (e.g. ballet tights), driving long-term scalable sales growth.
Built and optimized websites and landing pages including domains, hosting, SSL, WordPress setup, CRO, on-page SEO, semantic core, and keyword structures.
Developed automation and data pipelines for marketing analytics, audience building, and campaign performance evaluation.

experiences.intro: Led search-driven paid acquisition by building intent-focused keyword architectures, aligning Google Ads campaign structure with semantic cores, and optimizing landing pages to maximize conversion efficiency and ROI.
highlights: Built semantic cores and segmented keyword structures based on the company s core services.
Developed advanced Google Ads campaign architectures aligned with high intent focus keywords.
Optimized websites and landing pages to match paid search strategy and keyword intent.
Launched and managed PPC campaigns with daily optimization, including search term analysis and negative keyword management.
Monitored performance, tracked conversions, and continuously improved campaign results.

experiences.intro: Supported digital growth initiatives across analytics, SEO, paid social, and mobile app optimization by combining performance tracking, keyword planning, campaign execution, and structured reporting.
highlights: Worked with Google Analytics to track, analyze, and optimize website performance.
Planned keywords and supported SEO by integrating them into website and blog content.
Managed Facebook Ads campaigns: setup, targeting, performance analysis, and conversion tracking.
Built structured reporting templates for marketing and performance metrics.
Adapted content to target audiences of English Club TV products.
Managed social media marketing activities (Facebook, VKontakte).
Conducted ASO for two mobile applications (Readdo and ECTV B2B) on both iOS and Android platforms.

career.subtitle: Selected roles, impact, and core competencies.

projects.title: Side project
projects.subtitle: A self-built platform for investor discovery and deal analysis.

crino.title: Crino.io
crino.subtitle: Investor discovery & deal analysis platform
crino.description: A personal project where I applied my full-stack development skills in a real product.
highlights: Built the platform end-to-end: frontend, backend, and data layer
Focused on investor discovery, deal analysis, and data-driven insights
Developed a full-stack codebase of 70,000+ lines across React frontend, Node.js backend, and supporting services.
As of February 5, 2026, the project ranked #14 on Google for the query “investor database”.
As of February 5, 2026, it supports 251 registered users with active usage, powered by an automated pipeline that refreshes deal data every two days without manual intervention.

items.description: Completed Bachelor of Marketing at Sep 2007 - May - 2014.
Completed SEO course by MOZ at Nov 20, 2017.
Completed SEO online course at Nov 16, 2017.
Completed Google Ads Search at Jan 20, 2026.

cases.title: Cases
cases.content: Selected case studies from my work in growth, operations, and automation.

1.title: Ballet tights and actviwear
1.subtitle: US-made clothes for ballet dancers
1.intro: Organic Google traffic grew from 105 users in December 2017 to 6,500+ users in April 2019. By January 2021, we were already attracting more than 11,000 targeted users from Google every month.

2.title: Online grocery app in Ethiopia
2.subtitle: Target audience: People living in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
2.intro: Design and launch of a B2B platform for restaurants and hotels.
highlights: These screenshots show the performance of all remarketing-stage ad sets during the selected period.
Those remarketing campaigns generated:
1.34M reach;
189,031 purchases recorded;
33,593 1-st time customers who placed their first order;
Average CPM: €0.97;
Built pricing & margin control logic
Integrated Telegram-based ordering

3.title: Online grocery app in Ethiopia
3.subtitle: Target audience: People living in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
3.intro: Remarketing performance case focused on driving verified registrations, first-time purchases, and efficient customer acquisition.
highlights: Screenshots show performance of remarketing-stage campaigns in Meta Ads Manager.
Tracked custom funnel events: user registration after SMS verification and first-time purchase.
€47,252 total ad spend during the selected period (Jan–Dec 2025).
37,977 verified user registrations generated.
28,239 first-time purchasers recorded.
Average cost per first-time purchaser (CAC): €1.67.
170M+ ad impressions delivered across remarketing campaigns.

4.title: Automated KPI reporting system
4.subtitle: Weekly executive KPI presentation automation
4.intro: Design and implementation of an automated KPI reporting system that generates executive-ready presentation slides from a centralized dataset.
highlights: Built a Python-based automation system consisting of more than 25 scripts.
Used a single source of truth containing all orders and related performance metrics.
Automated data processing, aggregation, and KPI calculations across the full order lifecycle.
Generated ready-to-use presentation slides for weekly executive KPI meetings.
Eliminated manual slide preparation and reduced reporting time and human error.
Ensured consistent, repeatable, and data-driven KPI reporting for leadership reviews.

5.title: Meta Ads customer acquisition at scale
5.subtitle: Performance-driven paid acquisition for e-commerce marketplace
5.intro: Planning, launching, and optimizing hundreds of Meta Ads campaigns for ChipChip, focused on scalable customer acquisition through systematic testing of creatives, audiences, and messaging angles.
highlights: Launched and managed hundreds of Meta Ads campaigns across multiple growth phases.
Tested and optimized diverse creative formats including static, video, and offer-led ads.
Segmented and scaled multiple audience types (broad, interest-based, lookalikes, retargeting).
Experimented with different messaging angles such as price, convenience, freshness, and group-buying value.
Continuously analyzed performance metrics (CPA, CTR, conversion rate) to guide budget allocation.
Scaled winning combinations while systematically killing underperforming creatives and audiences.
Contributed directly to sustained customer acquisition growth and improved marketing efficiency.

6.title: Custom Google Ads ROAS tracking with Shopify
6.subtitle: Accurate first-time customer attribution and revenue measurement
6.intro: Designed and implemented a custom conversion tracking and reporting setup for Google Ads using Shopify as the single source of truth, ensuring accurate first-time customer attribution and clean ROAS calculation without GA4 duplication.
highlights: Implemented custom Shopify-integrated conversion tracking for first-time customer attribution.
Eliminated data duplication issues caused by standard GA4 conversion events.
Created custom Google Ads columns to calculate ROAS directly from Shopify sales value and ad spend.
Built a dedicated Google Ads dashboard focused exclusively on Shopify-based conversions.
Ensured clean, consistent revenue attribution across all campaigns.
Enabled reliable performance analysis for both branding and performance campaigns.
Achieved an average ROAS of 3.40 across all campaigns for the full year of 2019.

7.title: Automated PDF Transaction Audit System
7.subtitle: OCR-based extraction and consolidation of financial transaction data
7.intro: Designed and implemented an automated system to process transaction PDF documents using OCR technology, transforming unstructured files into a clean, auditable dataset suitable for financial and investor audits.
highlights: Built an OCR-based pipeline to extract structured data from transaction PDF documents.
Standardized data from multiple non-uniform document layouts.
Consolidated all company transactions into a single CSV dataset.
Enabled fast reconciliation and verification of historical transactions.
Improved audit readiness for external investors and financial reviewers.
Reduced manual data entry and human error in transaction analysis.
Delivered a scalable and reproducible data extraction workflow.
